title: Memory
description: This is a project for Code Jam for Chas Academy's Fullstack Java Extended class of '23. The game is developed in 100% html, css and js vanilla and has four different modes of difficulty. It's super dumb. Check it out!

title: Java Joke
description: This is just a silly joke by a silly goose. Pay no attention to it. Best be on your way now.. close this window.

title: Small Game
description: This is another project from our Code Jam sessions. A simple rock, paper, scissors game coded 100% in vanilla html, css and javascript!

title: CSS Grid
description: This is a small project to try Grid as a layout, working with responsitivity. The layout with change in laptop, tablet and mobile view. It's a small gallery of my dog Stevie.

title: Mermaid
description: This a side project for my favourite local drag club. It is based on their own website, but improved with more eloborate information, images and responsitivity. Compare with the original: https://clubmermaid.se/
